Bombshell giggled gleefully. He then attempted to insert a cerebro shell in=
to Periwinkle's head! This would make her a slave...

  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, =
February 15, 2002 3:41 AM
  Subject: Re: I WILL NOT LEAVE TILL THE CHIVTRON=
S ARE DEAD!


  McGowan's eyes glimmered as Bombshell's horn was drove thro=
ugh Periwinkle's head. Periwinkle yells and struggles to free herself to no=
 avail. Virgo laughs as Birdbot's 2 grenades click and explode! Papertron's=
 stick of dynamite follows the explosion with it's own, equally as big. Bot=
h explosions create one big fiery blaze heading for the Chivtron base....

=
  OOC: And I have a question. Who is in control of the Chivtron base? Becau=
se there are many shots heading towards it and I'd like it if the attacks w=
ere not ignored.
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Narrator 
    =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, February 15, 2002 1:05 AM
   =
 Subject: Re: I WILL NOT LEAVE TILL THE CHIVTRONS ARE DEAD!


    Barrage a=
imed a cannon at Periwinkle.

    Barrage: One cannonball coming up!

    B=
ombshell: Wait, Barrage! I haven't got to enslave one person in this whole =
RPG so far!

    Chop Shop: Enslave her for us all!

    Bombshell looks at=
 Periwinkle evilly. He runs at her and then throws himself, trying to stab =
the pointy tip of his horn into Periwinkle's head!...

      ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
      From: *Orchid* 
      To: NBW 
      Sent: Friday, Fe=
bruary 15, 2002 12:05 AM
      Subject: I WILL NOT LEAVE TILL THE CHIVTRONS=
 ARE DEAD!


      OOC: Yes, I know many are disappointed that I will not l=
eave, so too bad. I will not leave till the chivtrons are terminated. And b=
ecause of this new rule, only 5 characters, well, I know how to solve that.=


      IC:

      Fascino, Armada, Venomous, Twister and Quake get into a =
ship and fly away....

      ~~~~~~

      Scan and Zo=EB get into their sm=
all ship and take off.....

      ~~~~~~

      Hazel, Cerulean and Bronze =
exit the Chivtron base. They run past the attackers, hoping to avoid being =
hit.

      Periwinkle: Wait!

      Hazel, Cerulean and Bronze get into th=
e ship they arrived in, hoping it'll work.

      Periwinkle: Wait!!

     =
 Periwinkle struggles to stand up, having been hit by all the Insecticon's =
attacks before. The ship takes off. Periwinkle was left alone....

      Mc=
Gowan smiles and fires a missile at Periwinkle and a missile at the Chivtro=
n base.

      Virgo fires 6 shots and a poison dart at Periwinkle.

      =
Barrymore fires 5 shots at the Chivtron base.

      Lee fires off 2 fireba=
lls towards the Chivtron base.

      Depp fires 5 plasma shots at The Chiv=
tron base.

      Birdbot fires off 2 grenades, both landing near the Chivt=
ron base.

      Papertron throws a lit stick of dynamite near the Chivtron=
 base and fires 8 shots towards the base.

      Periwinkle is struck by al=
l the shots while she watched the ship fly off. She drops to her knees, not=
 paying any attention to the battle...

    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is su=
bject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
   =
    
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of=
 Service.
